name: TriglycerideInBloodSerumOrPlasma
title: Triglyceride in blood, serum or plasma
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for triglyceride results in blood, serum and plasma.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover or request blood, serum and plasma triglyceride levels in clinical records.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing triglyceride terms in blood, serum and plasma along with HDL and Cholesterol ratio.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent triglyceride terms in blood, serum and plasma.)
